char_info.desc: The Phantoms Who Leap Through Time

a0.speaker: Kagami:
a0.dialogue: You are not going to join the raid, Lady Yuyuko's handmaid?

a1.speaker: Kagami:
a1.dialogue: Then you must regret this choice as after we are done with this business, we can then loot whatever is inside there!

a2.speaker: Youmu:
a2.dialogue: I have no regrets about joining the raid.

a3.speaker: Youmu:
a3.dialogue: And, while I am indeed her handmaid, why are you acting so weird towards me? Am I some kind of big shot?

a4.speaker: Yumi:
a4.dialogue: Indeed you are, swor... I mean, Miss Youmu. But I heard there is plenty of gold inside there for us to loot.

a5.speaker: Kagami:
a5.dialogue: I know you are going to proceed further into the concert, but beware, as you are taking some metal...

a7.speaker: Kagami:
a7.dialogue: You leave before I even finish warning you? Fine, I won't be responsible for whatever failures you will have!
